review: After a month or so Netflix quit working on the amazon fire...and no matter what we try it will not work...we've tried every trick, reset, clear cache whatever and it won't work, which makes this thing for the most part pointless...running it and typing with the remote provided sucks too....overpriced and poor performance....FYI can play Netflix on PlayStation, PC, smart phone, everything except the amazon fire.

review: I've been using this for 5 or 6 months since I cut the cord from cable.  I'm a prime member and I added on our subscriptions to Netflix and Hulu plus and these cover most of what we were watching when we had cable for a whole lot less of a monthly expense.  When I have had issues with the Fire Tv, I've unplugged it for about 10 seconds to reset it and plugged it back in and then everything was good.  I've had to reset the device maybe 3 times but it gets a lot of use.
